text: (Guest show) il pane e le rose live from Lecce
Tune into ambient topolo for a mini performance
Channel 2 (TBC) is now also a kind of ambient channel. Two microphones are hanging outside IZBA for people to use for impromptu radio chats
And at 17:30 on channel 2 - a conversation between Radio Onde Furlane, Radio Študent and Radio Robida!
